item.title: Pokemon-Encoder
item.description: This is just a small writeup I made for a shellcode payload encoder that I made for the the OSEP exam. Goals: Make sure the entropy is at a level similar to English If the same shellcode is ran through the encoder multiple times, the result will be different but the result is the same No key is needed to decrypt the shellcode. Just an algo This technique was sponsored by the Pokemon Save Game Checksum Method.
